section.SSBody: Gunn Robotics is generously funded by sponsors and companies from around the bay. We would like to especially thank them for providing mentor support and assets for team trips. We receive money for supplies, as well as money from the school to pay mentors.

Bosch provides most of the GRT mentors. It is a German Robotics Company specializing in Autonomous technologies. Bosch has graciously donated many contributions to GRT, and are currently the teams largest sponsor and biggest outreach of mentors.
SRI is an independant research center that works with clients to turn ideas into products. One of our mentors, Karl Van Dyk, is from SRT.
Qualcomm is a wireless telecommunications research and development company.
Madco is our local welding and gas supplier, and as a sponsor of GRT donates cylinders of gas required for welding.
Non-profit education foundation dedicated to supporting all Palo Alto public schools. PAUSD generously provides funds for mentors.
